mapper.insert:
insert into t_bd_check_items (id, construction_id, type,name,parent_id, is_leaf,sort_num,create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) VALUES
(#{item.id},#{item.constructionId},#{item.type},#{item.name},#{item.parentId},#{item.isLeaf},#{item.sortNum},#{item.createTime},#{item.createBy},#{item.updateTime},#{item.updateBy})
